<?xml version="1.0"?>
<dwml version="1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://www.nws.noaa.gov/forecasts/xml/DWMLgen/schema/DWML.xsd">
  <head>
    <product srsName="WGS 1984" concise-name="dwmlByDay" operational-mode="official">
      <title>NOAA's National Weather Service Forecast by 24 Hour Period</title>
      <field>meteorological</field>
      <category>forecast</category>
      <creation-date refresh-frequency="PT1H">2014-05-06T01:33:10Z</creation-date>
    </product>
    <source>
      <more-information>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/forecasts/xml/</more-information>
      <production-center>Meteorological Development Laboratory<sub-center>Product Generation Branch</sub-center></production-center>
      <disclaimer>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/disclaimer.html</disclaimer>
      <credit>http://www.weather.gov/</credit>
      <credit-logo>http://www.weather.gov/images/xml_logo.gif</credit-logo>
      <feedback>http://www.weather.gov/feedback.php</feedback>
    </source>
  </head>
  <data>
    <location>
      <location-key>point1</location-key>
      <point latitude="34.10" longitude="-118.41"/>
    </location>
    <moreWeatherInformation applicable-location="point1">http://forecast.weather.gov/MapClick.php?textField1=34.10&textField2=-118.41</moreWeatherInformation>
    <time-layout time-coordinate="local" summarization="24hourly">
      <layout-key>k-p24h-n7-1</layout-key>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-06T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-07T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-07T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-08T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-08T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-09T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-09T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-10T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-10T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-11T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-11T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-12T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-12T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-13T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
    </time-layout>
    <time-layout time-coordinate="local" summarization="12hourly">
      <layout-key>k-p12h-n14-2</layout-key>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-06T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-06T18:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-06T18:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-07T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-07T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-07T18:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-07T18:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-08T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-08T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-08T18:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-08T18:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-09T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-09T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-09T18:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-09T18:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-10T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-10T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-10T18:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-10T18:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-11T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-11T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-11T18:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-11T18:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-12T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-12T06:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-12T18:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-12T18:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-13T06:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
    </time-layout>
    <time-layout time-coordinate="local" summarization="24hourly">
      <layout-key>k-p9h-n1-3</layout-key>
      <start-valid-time>2014-05-06T12:00:00-07:00</start-valid-time>
      <end-valid-time>2014-05-06T21:00:00-07:00</end-valid-time>
    </time-layout>
    <parameters applicable-location="point1">
      <temperature type="maximum" units="Fahrenheit" time-layout="k-p24h-n7-1">
        <name>Daily Maximum Temperature</name>
        <value>66</value>
        <value>70</value>
        <value>73</value>
        <value>75</value>
        <value>78</value>
        <value>81</value>
        <value>82</value>
      </temperature>
      <temperature type="minimum" units="Fahrenheit" time-layout="k-p24h-n7-1">
        <name>Daily Minimum Temperature</name>
        <value>53</value>
        <value>53</value>
        <value>57</value>
        <value>60</value>
        <value>62</value>
        <value>63</value>
        <value xsi:nil="true"/>
      </temperature>
      <probability-of-precipitation type="12 hour" units="percent" time-layout="k-p12h-n14-2">
        <name>12 Hourly Probability of Precipitation</name>
        <value>16</value>
        <value>4</value>
        <value>3</value>
        <value>3</value>
        <value>3</value>
        <value>2</value>
        <value>2</value>
        <value>0</value>
        <value>0</value>
        <value>0</value>
        <value>0</value>
        <value>0</value>
        <value>0</value>
        <value xsi:nil="true"/>
      </probability-of-precipitation>
      <weather time-layout="k-p24h-n7-1">
        <name>Weather Type, Coverage, and Intensity</name>
        <weather-conditions weather-summary="Partly Sunny"/>
        <weather-conditions weather-summary="Partly Sunny"/>
        <weather-conditions weather-summary="Mostly Sunny"/>
        <weather-conditions weather-summary="Mostly Sunny"/>
        <weather-conditions weather-summary="Patchy Fog">
          <value coverage="patchy" intensity="none" weather-type="fog" qualifier="none"/>
        </weather-conditions>
        <weather-conditions weather-summary="Patchy Fog">
          <value coverage="patchy" intensity="none" weather-type="fog" qualifier="none"/>
        </weather-conditions>
        <weather-conditions weather-summary="Mostly Sunny"/>
      </weather>
      <conditions-icon type="forecast-NWS" time-layout="k-p24h-n7-1">
        <name>Conditions Icons</name>
        <icon-link>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/weather/images/fcicons/sct.jpg</icon-link>
        <icon-link>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/weather/images/fcicons/sct.jpg</icon-link>
        <icon-link>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/weather/images/fcicons/few.jpg</icon-link>
        <icon-link>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/weather/images/fcicons/few.jpg</icon-link>
        <icon-link>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/weather/images/fcicons/sctfg.jpg</icon-link>
        <icon-link>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/weather/images/fcicons/sctfg.jpg</icon-link>
        <icon-link>http://www.nws.noaa.gov/weather/images/fcicons/few.jpg</icon-link>
      </conditions-icon>
      <hazards time-layout="k-p9h-n1-3">
        <name>Watches, Warnings, and Advisories</name>
        <hazard-conditions>
          <hazard hazardCode="WI.Y" phenomena="Wind" significance="Advisory" hazardType="long duration">
            <hazardTextURL>http://forecast.weather.gov/wwamap/wwatxtget.php?cwa=lox&wwa=Wind%20Advisory</hazardTextURL>
          </hazard>
        </hazard-conditions>
      </hazards>
    </parameters>
  </data>
</dwml>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> 
<?xml-stylesheet href="latest_ob.xsl" type="text/xsl"?>
<current_observation version="1.0"
	 xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
	 xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
	 xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://www.weather.gov/view/current_observation.xsd">
	<credit>NOAA's National Weather Service</credit>
	<credit_URL>http://weather.gov/</credit_URL>
	<image>
		<url>http://weather.gov/images/xml_logo.gif</url>
		<title>NOAA's National Weather Service</title>
		<link>http://weather.gov</link>
	</image>
	<suggested_pickup>15 minutes after the hour</suggested_pickup>
	<suggested_pickup_period>60</suggested_pickup_period>
	<location>Santa Monica Muni, CA</location>
	<station_id>KSMO</station_id>
	<latitude>34.03</latitude>
	<longitude>-118.45</longitude>
	<observation_time>Last Updated on May 5 2014, 5:51 pm PDT</observation_time>
        <observation_time_rfc822>Mon, 05 May 2014 17:51:00 -0700</observation_time_rfc822>
	<weather>Fair</weather>
	<temperature_string>66.0 F (18.9 C)</temperature_string>
	<temp_f>66.0</temp_f>
	<temp_c>18.9</temp_c>
	<relative_humidity>61</relative_humidity>
	<wind_string>Southwest at 11.5 MPH (10 KT)</wind_string>
	<wind_dir>Southwest</wind_dir>
	<wind_degrees>240</wind_degrees>
	<wind_mph>11.5</wind_mph>
	<wind_kt>10</wind_kt>
	<pressure_string>1013.5 mb</pressure_string>
	<pressure_mb>1013.5</pressure_mb>
	<pressure_in>29.93</pressure_in>
	<dewpoint_string>52.0 F (11.1 C)</dewpoint_string>
	<dewpoint_f>52.0</dewpoint_f>
	<dewpoint_c>11.1</dewpoint_c>
	<visibility_mi>10.00</visibility_mi>
 	<icon_url_base>http://forecast.weather.gov/images/wtf/small/</icon_url_base>
	<two_day_history_url>http://www.weather.gov/data/obhistory/KSMO.html</two_day_history_url>
	<icon_url_name>skc.png</icon_url_name>
	<ob_url>http://www.weather.gov/data/METAR/KSMO.1.txt</ob_url>
	<disclaimer_url>http://weather.gov/disclaimer.html</disclaimer_url>
	<copyright_url>http://weather.gov/disclaimer.html</copyright_url>
	<privacy_policy_url>http://weather.gov/notice.html</privacy_policy_url>
</current_observation>
